OOC: Yes, I own Twisted Metal 4, and I like it, so if you've got a problem =
with me using the name Quatro then that's too bad isn't it!

::Quatro::

  =
    A strange little, space vehicle entered Earth's atmosphere.  It was hot=
 up there.  Then, a voice came from the vehicle, as if the vehicle itself w=
as speaking.

      "Enable heat shields," the voice said.

       A blue, =
energy field appeared around the vehicle.  The vehicle passed down through =
the atmosphere, and was now approaching the ground.  It slowed down, so it =
wouldn't cause any damage when it landed.  It disabled the heat shields.  T=
he vehicle hovered when it got close to the ground.  Then, the vehicle tran=
sformed into a tall, well built robot person.  It had green glowing eyes, a=
nd the rest of it's body was a silver-ish blue.  The robot had a male touch=
 to it, and also had a soul, and therefore was known as a "he."

"Solar Sys=
tem:A2855X  
Planet:Earth  
Time Period:Prehistoric Era  
Dominating Lifefo=
rm:Transformer....Seeking information on Transformers," Quatro's scanners p=
aused.

"Lifeform:Transformers
Military Capabilities:Yes
Type:Robotic/Organ=
ic Traces
Seperate Factions/Groups:Yes
Status-Friend or Foe:Varies from Fac=
tions," Quatro found some information.

    Quatro had come here from follo=
wing two special targets which he was hired to terminate in order to make m=
oney and purchase upgrades.  A Predacon by the name of Hell Beast had at le=
ast, in human currency, a billion dollars on his head, but another one, wor=
th a little more, was a Predacon only known as Megatron.  Quatro scanned th=
e continent for traces of Megatron or Hell Beast.

   "Scanning area....Loa=
ding results....," A hologram emitted from Quatro's eyes.  It showed a pict=
ure of a destroyed Megatron,"Target Megatron found!  Target is deceased, ta=
rget poses no direct threat, target is worth nothing in current condition."=


    Quatro transformed into hover bike mode, and headed off.
